comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.msn.com/nb-no/weather/vaermelding/in-Monaco?item=cookiebannertype%3ANone&ocid=weather-app-win&loc=eyJsIjoiTW9uYWNvIiwiYyI6Ik1vbmFjbyIsImkiOiJNQyIsInQiOjEwMiwiZyI6Im5iLW5vIiwieCI6IjcuNDI3NDk5NzcxMTE4MTY0IiwieSI6IjQzLjczMTg5OTI2MTQ3NDYxIn0%3D&weadegreetype=C](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.msn.com%2Fnb-no%2Fweather%2Fvaermelding%2Fin-Monaco%3Fitem%3Dcookiebannertype%253ANone%26ocid%3Dweather-app-win%26loc%3DeyJsIjoiTW9uYWNvIiwiYyI6Ik1vbmFjbyIsImkiOiJNQyIsInQiOjEwMiwiZyI6Im5iLW5vIiwieCI6IjcuNDI3NDk5NzcxMTE4MTY0IiwieSI6IjQzLjczMTg5OTI2MTQ3NDYxIn0%253D%26weadegreetype%3DC) ### Comment > So this is a 2-for-1 report that the report form wasn't designed for: Primarily for Windows 11's Weather app, but secondarily also for Vivaldi. > > An ad (Possibly a fallback ad for if MSN's usual scripts fail, but I can't tell for sure) in the lower right spot, and very often also in the upper right spot. > > In Vivaldi the spots are placeholders that I've been able to fix with: > ``` > msn.com##div[class^=sectionItem]:has(> views-native-ad) > msn.com##div[id^=DisplayAd] > ``` > But I have not been able to get them to work in the app, and I've tried to block various `assets.msn.com` scripts for the app, but failed to find a way to remove the ad(s) without also removing at least ⅓ of the app's functions.
Username: `@DandelionSprout` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ojtry02zf28084c8kcc0oosws000kwon5hippi4ohw.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/lphj5kco5n48sow0cwkss4cwo44g0cwertsuoik4xw.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.20.2 System version: | Windows 11 24H2 x64 Browser: | msedgewebview2.exe AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Annoyances:
Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List

Language-specific:
Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters,
Dandelion Sprout's Serbo-Croatian List,
Adblock List for Finland Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | enabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html)

issue.body:
